text: @Jacob_Rees_Mogg People's priorities are to eradicate covid19. The message you are sending out is just go back to work! 3 votes x 30min queuing. Where I work, the Company has in last week brought in covid19 measures _ in a retail job, removing teaspoons, stirers, knives and folks.
